mapped_crf_fields.label: Death Date
mapped_crf_fields.mapping_rationale: Maps to Death Date field on the Disposition - Survival form, which is cross-domain mapped to DM.DTHDTC.

mappings.risk_if_erroneous: Directly changes primary endpoint (OS) status/time for subject.
lineage_path: DTHDAT (Death Date from FORM-DS-SURVIVAL)→ V2 (Event Date)→ V1 (OS Time)→ M1→ E1
mappings.data_collection_guidance: Verify Date of Death against source documents. Primary endpoint event. Primary Event Date for OS (Primary Estimand).

mapped_crf_fields.label: Disposition Event Start Date
mapped_crf_fields.mapping_rationale: Maps to Disposition Event Start Date on the Disposition - Survival form, representing the Date Last Known Alive when survival status is 'Alive'.

mappings.risk_if_erroneous: Incorrect censoring time affects KM curves and Hazard Ratio for primary endpoint.
lineage_path: DSSTDAT (Disposition Event Start Date from FORM-DS-SURVIVAL)→ V2 (Event/Censor Date)→ V1 (OS Time)→ M1→ E1
mappings.data_collection_guidance: Verify Date Last Known Alive (Survival Follow-up) against source documents. Primary endpoint censoring. Determines censoring time for OS (Primary Estimand). Errors directly affect analysis value.

mapped_crf_fields.label: Lab Result or Finding in Original Units
mapped_crf_fields.mapping_rationale: Maps to Lab Result field on the Laboratory form, specifically for 'Neutrophils' as indicated by the LBTEST field.

mappings.risk_if_erroneous: Incorrect value misclassifies patient into/out of Primary LREM Population (POP2).
lineage_path: LBORRES (Lab Result or Finding in Original Units from FORM-LB)→ V14 (NLR)→ V13 (Score)→ V12 (Flag)→ POP2→ M2→ E2
mappings.data_collection_guidance: Verify Neutrophils (Baseline) against source documents. Missing value leads to exclusion from Low Risk analysis set. Component of Prognostic Score (V13) -> LREM Flag (V12) -> POP2 (FAS LREM). POP2 is a Primary Analysis Population (E2). Errors here misclassify patients in the primary analysis.

mapped_crf_fields.label: Lab Result or Finding in Original Units
mapped_crf_fields.mapping_rationale: Maps to Lab Result field on the Laboratory form, specifically for 'Albumin' as indicated by the LBTEST field.

mappings.risk_if_erroneous: Incorrect value misclassifies patient into/out of Primary LREM Population (POP2).
lineage_path: LBORRES (Lab Result or Finding in Original Units from FORM-LB)→ V13 (Score)→ V12 (Flag)→ POP2→ M2→ E2
mappings.data_collection_guidance: Verify Albumin (Baseline) against source documents. Component of Prognostic Score (V13) -> LREM Flag (V12) -> POP2. POP2 is Primary Analysis Population.

mapped_crf_fields.label: Lab Result or Finding in Original Units
mapped_crf_fields.mapping_rationale: Maps to Lab Result field on the Laboratory form, specifically for 'Lactate Dehydrogenase' as indicated by the LBTEST field.

mappings.risk_if_erroneous: Incorrect value misclassifies patient into/out of Primary LREM Population (POP2).
lineage_path: LBORRES (Lab Result or Finding in Original Units from FORM-LB)→ V13→ V12→ POP2→ M2→ E2
mappings.data_collection_guidance: Verify LDH (Baseline) against source documents. Component of Prognostic Score -> POP2 (Primary Population).

mapped_crf_fields.mapping_rationale: Maps to Lab Result field on the Laboratory form, specifically for 'Gamma Glutamyltransferase' as indicated by the LBTEST field.

mappings.risk_if_erroneous: Incorrect value misclassifies patient into/out of Primary LREM Population (POP2).
lineage_path: LBORRES (Lab Result or Finding in Original Units from FORM-LB)→ V13→ V12→ POP2→ M2→ E2
mappings.data_collection_guidance: Verify GGT (Baseline) against source documents. Component of Prognostic Score -> POP2 (Primary Population).

mapped_crf_fields.label: Lab Result or Finding in Original Units
mapped_crf_fields.mapping_rationale: Maps to Lab Result field on the Laboratory form, specifically for 'Aspartate Aminotransferase' as indicated by the LBTEST field.

mappings.risk_if_erroneous: Incorrect value misclassifies patient into/out of Primary LREM Population (POP2).
lineage_path: LBORRES (Lab Result or Finding in Original Units from FORM-LB)→ V13→ V12→ POP2→ M2→ E2
mappings.data_collection_guidance: Verify AST (Baseline) against source documents. Component of Prognostic Score -> POP2 (Primary Population).

mapped_crf_fields.label: Lab Result or Finding in Original Units
mapped_crf_fields.mapping_rationale: Maps to Lab Result field on the Laboratory form, specifically for 'Lymphocytes' as indicated by the LBTEST field.

mappings.risk_if_erroneous: Incorrect value misclassifies patient into/out of Primary LREM Population (POP2).
lineage_path: LBORRES (Lab Result or Finding in Original Units from FORM-LB)→ V14 (NLR)→ V13→ V12→ POP2→ M2→ E2
mappings.data_collection_guidance: Verify Lymphocytes (Baseline) against source documents. Missing value leads to exclusion from Low Risk analysis set. Component of Prognostic Score (via NLR V14) -> POP2 (Primary Population).

mapped_crf_fields.label: Result
mapped_crf_fields.mapping_rationale: Maps to Result field on the EORTC QLQ-C30 form, specifically for Items 29, 30 of the EORTC QLQ-C30 questionnaire.

mappings.data_collection_guidance: Verify PRO Global Health Score (Items 29, 30) against source documents. Component of Secondary PRO Estimands (E13).

unmapped_criticality_items.reason: Data collected via IVRS/IWRS, not directly on an eCRF form provided.
Data collected via IVRS/IWRS, not directly on an eCRF form provided.
Data collected via IVRS/IWRS, not directly on an eCRF form provided.
Data collected via IVRS/IWRS, not directly on an eCRF form provided.
RECIST assessment data (RS domain) is typically derived or collected on a dedicated form not provided in the aCRF. FORM-TU collects lesion-level data, not overall RECIST dates.

unmapped_criticality_items.criticality_description: Date of Last Evaluable RECIST Assessment
unmapped_criticality_items.reason: RECIST assessment data (RS domain) is typically derived or collected on a dedicated form not provided in the aCRF. FORM-TU collects lesion-level data, not overall RECIST dates.
